thread.title: Michael Thompson
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Michael Thompson

author: Michael Thompson
title: Michael Thompson
text: Julie Evans did a fantastic job of finding the best auto and renter's insurance for me and my wife! Her can-do spirit and patience answering my questions was refreshing. Plus, she thoroughly informed me of my options as she checked and compared rates. It was nice to talk to someone who spoke English, too. Real English!
